name: Entity (itch) (Warmluft)
description:
Hello I'm Tiger from university group SUPH-11! 

"Entity" is our first real game project made by a group of university students.

It is the result of a 1 month game jam-esque assignment, in which the biggest requirement was that the structure of the game should be based off of a certain yellow ball. 

Please let us know what you think!

The base story of the game is essentially:

You wake up in your school, but there is a problem. It's night time. The school is haunted. Get out of there, as quickly as possible.

I don't want to spoil the rest so look into it and feel free to post your own interpretation in the comments!

Team members:

Yasmine - Graphics

Linnea - Graphics

Remi - Graphics

Tiger - Design & Programming

Einar - Programming & Design
